item.title: Blog 2: A Simplified Look at What Multimember Congressional Districts Would Look Like In Floriida
item.description: Multimember Congressional Districts In Florida Introduction One of the things that has fascinated me the most about U.S. Politics versus the rest of the world is how our elections work. No, I am not referring to our wonky electoral college system, but rather our preferred voting systed: First-Past-The-Post Single member districts. All across the country, almost every single election is won by a candidate receiving the pluraluty of votes (or sometimes even a majority is required, how exciting!
